title: Add tests directory and test infrastructure
description: basedpyright reports 'File or directory tests does not exist'. Set up pytest infrastructure with basic test coverage for movement and health calculations.

title: Refactor Magic Numbers to Configuration
description: The hello_world.py file contains hardcoded values for screen size, step_size (speed), frame rate (1/60, 1/12), and animation duration. Move these to a constant configuration block or class to improve maintainability.

title: Use named constants for diagonal movement factor
description: Line 122 has a magic number 0.7071 (1/sqrt(2)) for diagonal normalization. Extract to a named constant DIAGONAL_FACTOR with a comment explaining it.

title: Remove debugging print statement from __init__.py
description: The 'print(Hello from pyglet-readme!)' on line 5 of __init__.py is leftover debugging cruft that should be removed.

title: Move imports to module level - avoid imports inside function body
description: The 'from pyglet.window import key, mouse' import is inside run_hello_world() on line 8. This is non-standard and makes dependencies unclear. Move to module level.

title: Implement Mouse Health Bar & Damage Logic
description: Implement Mouse Health state and logic. Formula: DrainRate = BaseRate * (1 - (Distance / CatchRange)). CatchRange = (MaxDim(Kitten) + MaxDim(Mouse)) / 2. Trigger Loss State when HP <= 0.
close_reason: Implemented Phase 1 & 2 of Health System as per specification.

title: Implement Kitten Stamina & Vampiric Logic
description: Implement Kitten Stamina logic. Passive drain: 2 units/s. Vampiric regen: same formula as mouse damage. Trigger Win State when Stamina <= 0.
close_reason: Implemented Phase 1 & 2 of Health System as per specification.

title: Asset Organization and Management
description: Reorganize game assets from flat src/ directory into structured assets/ folder with categories (images, sprites, audio/sfx, audio/music, source). Includes asset manifest, generation scripts, and updated gitignore. See specs/asset_organization.md for full specification.

title: Create Asset Directory Structure
description: Create the assets/ directory structure: images/, sprites/, audio/sfx/, audio/music/, and source/. Move existing assets to their appropriate locations.

title: Update Asset Loading Paths
description: Modify hello_world.py to load assets from new locations under assets/ directory. Update pyglet.resource.image and pyglet.resource.media calls.

title: Create Sprite Sheet Generation Script
description: Implement scripts/generate_assets.ps1 to generate mouse_sheet.png sprite sheet from mouse.mp4 video source using ffmpeg and ImageMagick.

title: Create Asset Manifest
description: Add assets/manifest.yaml documenting all assets with metadata: paths, dimensions, grid sizes for sprites, durations for audio, and tracking status.

title: Update .gitignore for New Asset Structure
description: Update .gitignore patterns to reflect new asset directory structure. Ignore assets/source/ and large files in assets/audio/music/ and assets/sprites/.

title: Create Asset Restoration Script
description: Implement scripts/restore_assets.ps1 to help developers restore missing gitignored assets after fresh clone. Support regeneration and download sources.

title: Implement Screen Bound Bouncing
description: Currently, the mouse and kitten can move off-screen or stop at the edge. Implement simple physics reflection (bounce) when hitting window boundaries to keep the gameplay contained and dynamic.

title: Add Sprint Mechanic for Mouse
description: Add a sprint ability for the Mouse (e.g., holding SHIFT) that increases speed temporarily. Implement a stamina bar or cooldown system to prevent abuse.

title: Extract UI strings to constants
description: Hardcoded strings like 'Hello, world!', 'Caught! (Press R to Reset)', 'You Win!! (Press R to Reset)' should be extracted to named constants for maintainability and potential i18n.

title: Remove pyright ignore comments by fixing underlying type issues
Centralize color palette definitions
description: Colors are hardcoded as tuples throughout the code: (50, 50, 50), (0, 255, 0), (255, 0, 0). Extract to named constants in config.py for consistency.

title: Add Unit Tests for Movement Logic
description: Currently, verification is manual. Extract the vector math (distance calculation, normalization) and movement logic (keyboard vs chase behavior) into pure functions and add unit tests using unittest or pytest.

title: Implement Inertia/Steering for Kitten AI
description: The Kitten currently turns instantly. Implement a steering behavior (Reynolds steering) or simple inertia so the Kitten has a turning radius, allowing the Mouse to outmaneuver it.

title: Implement Kitten Aggro/Sprint Mode
description: Optional/Future: Implement a high-speed burst mode for the kitten that consumes extra stamina.

title: Reduce nested function depth - extract update helper functions
description: The nested update() function at 115 lines is too complex. Extract helper functions for: mouse movement, kitten AI, health/stamina logic, UI updates, win/loss checks.

title: Add docstrings to functions
description: Key functions like run_hello_world(), update(), on_key_press(), on_mouse_press() lack docstrings. Add documentation explaining purpose, parameters, and behavior.

title: Testing Epic: Unit and Integration Tests for Asset System
Unit Tests: Asset Manifest parsing and validation
Integration Test: Asset directory structure and file locations
Integration Test: Asset loading in hello_world.py
Integration Test: Sprite sheet generation script (PowerShell)
End-to-End Test: Full game startup with new asset system
Implement Floating UI for Health Bars
description: Use pyglet.shapes to draw dynamic health bars above sprites. Refer to specs/health_system.md for visual requirements.
close_reason: Implemented Phase 1 & 2 of Health System as per specification.

title: Implement Asset Restoration Script
description: Large binary assets (ambience.wav, mouse_sheet.png) are currently ignored in VCS. Create a script (e.g., 'download_assets.py' or 'generate_assets.py') to restore them for fresh clones. This ensures the app is portable.

title: Implement Mouse Health Regeneration
description: Optional/Future: Implement slow HP regen for the mouse when away from the kitten for a set duration.

title: UI Design Epic: Multiple Screen Layouts
description: Design and implement multiple game screens/layouts: Intro/Home screen, Game screen, and Win/Loss/Result screen. This epic encompasses the overall UI architecture and individual screen implementations.

title: Intro/Home Screen Layout
description: Design and implement the intro/home screen with game title, start button, options menu access, and any branding elements. This is the first screen users see when launching the game.

title: Game Screen Layout
description: Design and implement the main game screen layout including the play area, HUD elements (health bars, stamina indicators), and any in-game UI components. This is the primary gameplay screen.

title: Win/Loss/Result Screen Layout
description: Design and implement the game result screen displayed after win or loss conditions are met. Include victory/defeat messaging, final stats display, play again option, and return to home screen option.

title: Logging System: Convert print() to logging, add --verbose CLI support
Entity System Refactoring
description: Refactor hello_world.py from monolithic function into modular entity-component architecture.\n\nSee specs/entity_system.md for full specification.

title: Entity Base Class
description: Create Entity dataclass with position, velocity, acceleration, and state management.\n\nFiles: src/pyglet_readme/entities/base.py

title: Character Entities (Kitten & Mouse)
description:
Extend Entity for Kitten and Mouse with specific behaviors:
- Kitten: AI chase logic, stamina system
- Mouse: Player input handling, health system

Files: src/pyglet_readme/entities/kitten.py, src/pyglet_readme/entities/mouse.py

title: Configuration Module
description: Extract all magic numbers into config.py with typed dataclass.\n\nFiles: src/pyglet_readme/config.py

title: Game State Machine
description: Replace game_over boolean with proper GameState enum and transitions.\n\nFiles: src/pyglet_readme/game.py

title: System Separation
description:
Split update logic into focused systems:
- health.py: Damage calculation, stamina drain
- collision.py: Bounds checking, catch detection
- input.py: Keyboard/mouse event routing

Files: src/pyglet_readme/systems/

title: UI Components
description: Extract health bar rendering into reusable HealthBar class.\n\nFiles: src/pyglet_readme/ui/health_bar.py

title: Refactor Mouse and Kitten into Character Entities
description:
Encapsulate mouse and kitten into character entity classes that contain:

**Data:**
- Location (x, y coordinates)
- Velocity
- Acceleration
- State variables (idle, moving, chasing, etc.)

**Behaviour:**
- Reaction to user events (keyboard, mouse input)
- Reaction to engine events (collisions, bounds checking)
- Movement logic
- Animation state management

title: Add Reaction Delay to Kitten AI
description: The Kitten currently tracks the Mouse perfectly every frame. Add a reaction delay or 'simulated perception' so the Kitten updates its target position less frequently or with a lag.
